channel.title: United-Gamerz ! [1.5.2] [Factions] [Towny] [Much More]
channel.description: [b]United-Gamerz Minecraft Economy/ Survival Server![/b] [u]Friendly Staff and 99.9% Uptime![/u] Hello everyone, looking for a fun server to play on? Well United Gamerz is good for anyone who has this desire! With a high percent uptime game as much as you want! Need help while playing? Ask for a mod and they will be extatic to help you out! Our main Minecraft Server IP: mc.united-gamerz.net Join Us on TeamSpeak 3: ts.united-gamerz.net United Gamerz {UG} Website and forums: united-gamerz.net A peek of our server! [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/66esft.jpg[/img] Enjoy your stay at the United Gamerz! Happy Gaming!
